title: Irma Urrila
text:
Irma Urrila (born 29 January 1943) is a Finnish <a href="opera">opera</a>tic <a href="soprano">soprano</a>, best known internationally for her role as Pamina in <a href="Ingmar%20Bergman">Ingmar Bergman</a>'s 1975 film production of Mozart's opera, "<a href="The%20Magic%20Flute%20%281975%20film%29">The Magic Flute</a>".
Urrila was born in Helsinki. In 1967, she sang the role of Marzelline in a film version of Beethoven's "<a href="Fidelio">Fidelio</a>" from the <a href="Savonlinna%20Opera%20Festival">Savonlinna Opera Festival</a>, and in 1978 she sang Tatjana in a film version of Tchaikovsky's "<a href="Eugene%20Onegin%20%28opera%29">Eugene Onegin</a>".
